results.title: Simvastatin preconditioning confers neuroprotection against hypoxia-ischemia induced brain damage in neonatal rats via autophagy and silent information regulator 1 (SIRT1) activation.
results.text_hl: Previous studies have shown that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Sim@@@) has neuroprotective effects in a neonatal model of @DISEASE_Hypoxia @DISEASE_MESH:D000860 @@@hypoxia@@@-@DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Hypoxia_Ischemia_Brain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020925 @@@HI@@@)-induced @DISEASE_Brain_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D001930 @@@brain injury@@@ when administered before but not after @<m>DISEASE_Hypoxia_Ischemia_Brain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020925 @@@HI@@@, pointing to the preconditioning (PC)-like effects of the statin.

citations.NLM: Carloni S, Balduini W. Simvastatin preconditioning confers neuroprotection against hypoxia-ischemia induced brain damage in neonatal rats via autophagy and silent information regulator 1 (SIRT1) activation. Exp Neurol. 2020 Feb;324():113117. PMID: 31734315
citations.BibTeX: @article{31734315, title={Simvastatin preconditioning confers neuroprotection against hypoxia-ischemia induced brain damage in neonatal rats via autophagy and silent information regulator 1 (SIRT1) activation.}, author={Carloni S and Balduini W}, journal={Exp Neurol}, volume={324}, pages={113117}}

results.title: Prophylactic but not delayed administration of simvastatin protects against long-lasting cognitive and morphological consequences of neonatal hypoxic-ischemic brain injury, reduces interleukin-1beta and tumor necrosis factor-alpha mRNA induction, and does not affect endothelial nitric oxide synthase expression.
results.text_hl: The experiment included sham-operated controls and @<m>DISEASE_Hypoxia_Ischemia_Brain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020925 @@@HI@@@ animals receiving daily saline or activated @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (20 mg/kg) injections from postnatal day 1 to day 7 (@<m>DISEASE_Hypoxia_Ischemia_Brain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020925 @@@HI@@@-@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 1-7 group), from postnatal day 4 to day 11 (@<m>DISEASE_Hypoxia_Ischemia_Brain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020925 @@@HI@@@-@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 4-11 group), or from postnatal day 7 to day 14 (@<m>DISEASE_Hypoxia_Ischemia_Brain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020925 @@@HI@@@-@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 7-14 group).

citations.NLM: Balduini W, Mazzoni E, Carloni S, De Simoni MG, Perego C, Sironi L, Cimino M. Prophylactic but not delayed administration of simvastatin protects against long-lasting cognitive and morphological consequences of neonatal hypoxic-ischemic brain injury, reduces interleukin-1beta and tumor necrosis factor-alpha mRNA induction, and does not affect endothelial nitric oxide synthase expression. Stroke. 2003 Aug;34(8):2007-12. PMID: 12829860

results.title: Effects of simvastatin on the expression of intercellular adhesion molecule-1 mRNA in neonatal brain with hypoxic-ischemic damage.
results.text_hl: Effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on the expression of @GENE_ICAM1 @GENE_25464 @@@intercellular adhesion molecule-1@@@ mRNA in neonatal brain with @<m>DISEASE_Hypoxia_Ischemia_Brain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020925 @@@hypoxic-ischemic damage@@@.

citations.NLM: Miao H, Jiang L, Huang L. Effects of simvastatin on the expression of intercellular adhesion molecule-1 mRNA in neonatal brain with hypoxic-ischemic damage. J Nanosci Nanotechnol. 2005 Aug;5(8):1261-5. PMID: 16193989

results.title: Simvastatin attenuates hypomyelination induced by hypoxia-ischemia in neonatal rats.
results.text_hl: Although a few reports have found recently that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ displays anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ and anti-apoptosis properties and improves the cognitive and morphological consequences in the neonatal @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ after @<m>DISEASE_Hypoxia_Ischemia_Brain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020925 @@@hypoxia-ischemia (@@@@<m>DISEASE_Hypoxia_Ischemia_Brain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020925 @@@HI) damage@@@, to our best knowledge, there has been no study of the effect of it on myelin formation after neonatal @DISEASE_Brain_Damage_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D001925 @@@brain damage@@@.

citations.NLM: Li A, Lv S, Yu Z, Zhang Y, Ma H, Zhao H, Piao H, Li S, Zhang N, Sun C. Simvastatin attenuates hypomyelination induced by hypoxia-ischemia in neonatal rats. Neurol Res. 2010 Nov;32(9):945-52. PMID: 20433776
